product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad - Long - Special Buy
long_description: Get a good night's rest while backpacking with the long ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad. It has an anti-slip ALPS logo on the top to help keep your sleeping bag from sliding around.
